comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: Prince Murat was the nephew of Napoleon Bonaparte. He moved to the United States in the 1820s and eventually settled in Tallahassee, where he became a planter and married Catherine Willis Gray in 1826. Murat died in 1847 and is buried in the Old City Cemetery. Catherine died in 1867 and was interred next to her husband.
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida
